subject: Sexual Health
title: Sexuality in Young Adulthood
description: A quick, practical guide to Sexuality in Young Adulthood.

hook.text: Young adults face a unique challenge: learning about their sexuality while navigating new and intense relationships.

buildup.text: This period involves exploration, identity formation, and the first experiences of deep romantic attachment.

discovery.text: The prefrontal cortex is not fully developed until age 25, affecting risk assessment in sexual decision-making.

twist.text: Despite having the most sex, young adults report lower satisfaction than older adults, due to less experience.

climax.text: Comprehensive sex education in young adulthood builds the foundation for healthier relationships for decades ahead.

punchline.text: Young adults have more sex but enjoy it less. Knowledge helps.

quiz.question: At what age is the prefrontal cortex fully developed?
